metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1475 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description:
The OpenID module in Drupal 6.x before 6.30 and 7.x before 7.26 allowsremote OpenID users to authenticate as other users via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1475` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.26-1').
